allow:
Bash(powershell -File - <<'EOF'
Get-ChildItem -Path 'c:\\Users\\senti\\Documents\\VSCode\\probat-web\\public' -Recurse -File | Sort-Object Length -Descending | Format-Table Name, @{Name='KB';Expression={[math]::Round\($_.Length/1024,1\)}} -AutoSize
EOF)

Bash(powershell -File - <<'EOF'
Get-ChildItem -Path 'c:\\Users\\senti\\Documents\\VSCode\\probat-web\\public\\videos' -Recurse -File -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Sort-Object Length -Descending | Format-Table Name, @{Name='MB';Expression={[math]::Round\($_.Length/1MB,2\)}} -AutoSize
EOF)
